title: Window 10 Firefox login table date scientific number conversion to Excel date numbers
content: Dear Sir or Madam; I downloaded a login CSV file from the Firefox browser. The date columns format in the CSV login file is ‘1.64055E+12’. In EXCEL, 44556.79166 would translate to 2021/12/26 18:59:59. The translation of ‘1.64055E+12’ should not be the same exact date, but should be in the same date range, as the 44556.79166 number. I’m not a mathematician. Would you please show me how to convert the '1.64055E+12' value to an equivalent excel date/time number? I could then format the excel date number cells to an yyyy/mm/dd hh:mm:ss format. These scientific number values are in the Firefox login file CSV downloads so I assume they were intended to be used in EXCEL spread sheet. These values converted to EXCEL date values would help me sort account password date change records by account name and change date. I could review sorted account records (and thus determine the current password for individual old accounts). Your solution would help me immensely and I appreciate your time. Sincerely, Clyde Stewart – wes45505@aol.com, Boise, ID
creator: wes45505

title: Notifications History
content: Using FF for Mac, latest version (95.0.2 at this writing). Web Push notifications pop-up, display for only a few seconds and disappear. There seems to be no way to view them after they flash on the screen. So many times a pop appears which may have some relevance, but before I can read it, it is gone. Why aren't they stored in the MacOS Notifications bar, or from the FF menu button. I have found no extension to provide this functionality, but IMO this should be a native feature in FF.
creator: lthibx

title: Cannot log into Express-Scripts
content: As of today, I can no longer log into my Express Scripts account on my PC using Firefox. I can log into virtually everything else using Firefox (i.e., my bank accounts, credit card accounts, brokerage accounts, etc.), but not Express Scripts. Previously, I had no problem with this login - over many, many years. And I find that I can log into Express Scripts easily using Edge, Chrome or (on my iPhone) Safari - so the problem would seems to be with Firefox. Specifically, when I try to log into Express Scripts using Firefox, a new small pop-up window arrives noting that, "This site is asking you to sign in." - the pop-up asks for user name and password to be typed into the pop-up, and provides a "sign in" and a "cancel" button - if the user name and password are inserted into the pop-up and "sign in" is clicked, the pop-up simply clears the user name and password - if "cancel" is clicked, the pop-up disappears, the original Express Scripts login window goes briefly to a "we'll be right with you" screen, then reverts back to the original login screen.

title: userChrome to extend menu bar color and cut away unecessary gap under tabs
content:
Hello All,

Using win10 & FF 91.4.1esr. and 'tabs on bottom' code in userChrome for various UI mods.

Looking for setting to accomplish following (see screencopy):

  1. Extend background color of menu bar
  2. Delete gap under tabs

The userChrome.css is below.

Cheers, Gert


root{ --uc-titlebar-padding: 0px; }

@media (-moz-os-version: windows-win10){

root[sizemode="maximized"][tabsintitlebar]{ --uc-titlebar-padding: 8px }

}

/* Bar for tabs at bottom */

  1. titlebar{ 
 -moz-box-ordinal-group: 2;  -moz-appearance: none !important;  --tabs-navbar-shadow-size: 0px;

}

root{ --uc-window-control-width: 0px !important }

/* Padding under menu file edit view. Opens space for URL bar */

  1. navigator-toolbox{ 
 padding-top: calc(30px + var(--uc-titlebar-padding,0px)) !important

}

/* Menu bar 'file edit view' above URL above bookmark buttons above tabs */

  1. toolbar-menubar{ 
 position: fixed;  display: flex;  top: var(--uc-titlebar-padding,0px);  height: 29px;  width: 100%;  overflow: hidden;

}


/* Create TABS: */

  • |*:root { 
--tab-toolbar-navbar-overlap: 0px !important; --tab-min-height: 30px !important; /*adjust to set height or omit to use density*/ --tab-min-width: 80px !important; /*adjust to set width or omit to use default*/

}

/* Erronous extra space below tabs */ /* #main-window:not([chromehidden*="toolbar"]) #navigator-toolbox {padding-bottom: var(--tab-min-height) !important;} */

.tab-background { 

 border-radius: 14px 14px 2px 2px !important;  border-image: none !important;  border-left: 1px solid !important;  border-right: 1px solid !important;  border-top: 1px solid !important;  border-width: 1px !important;  border-color: #000080 !important;  background-attachment: none!important;  background-color: #D4D0D7 !important;  background-image: none !important;

}

/* Change Color of active tab */ .tab-background[selected="true"] { 

   background-color: #E4E3DE !important;    background-image: none !important;

}

/* Color for : menu bar (File Edit View), URL bar, Bookmarks bar, tab bar */

  1. navigator-toolbox toolbar { 
 background-color: #F0F0F0 !important;

}

/* Menu bar (File Edit View) height and background color */ /* background-color: #DAD7D0 !important; */

  1. toolbar-menubar, #menubar-items, #main-menubar { 
 height: 26px !important;  background-color: #DAD7D0 !important;  background-image: none !important;  font-size: 10px !important;

}

/* Menu bar (File Edit View) mouseover background color */ menubar > menu[_moz-menuactive="true"] { 

 background-color: #C0C0C0 !important;

}

/* Menu bar (File Edit View) text color */ .menubar-text, .tabbrowser-tab:not([selected="true"]) tab-label { 

 color: #080808 !important;

}

/* Use Normal top and bottom padding for Compact */

  1. PlacesToolbarItems .bookmark-item { 
 padding-top: 4px !important;  padding-bottom: 4px !important;

}

title: Synchronizace práce/osobní
content: Dobrý den, hodila by se mi funkce v synchronizaci, která by mi umožnila přesněji definovat, co v jakém zařízení se má synchronizovat. Chci používat Firefox v práci i osobně. Osobně ho používám již mnoho let. Nyní by se mi hodilo, abych si mohl třeba vybrat k synchronizaci jen třeba jednu složku ze záložek, která by se jmenovala "Práce". Ostatní by se mi to pracovního počítače nestahovali a nesynchronizovali. Pak třeba složku "společné" a tam bych nastavil sync u všech zařízení. Stejně tak pro přihlašovací údaje. V osobních zařízeních sync=on a v pracovním sync=off. Ale vše by bylo společně vždy na serveru. Nyní jestli jsem to správně pochopil tak, když vypnu sync na pracovním počítači pro např. "přihlašovací údaje" vypli se mi i v mobilním zařizení, jen v něm zůstali uložené. Možná jsem jen nedohledal podrobnější nastavení. Mohu poprosit o navedení a správnou cestu? Také by bylo přijemné kdybych mohl toto vše řídit nebo vidět na serveru (Správa účtu). Moc Vám děkuji.

title: firefox 95.0.2 desktop. cant copy certificates unknown reason
content: Hi. I have mozilla firefox 95.0.2 on my personal dell laptot. No organization administrating. I cant copy certificates to a file for unknown reasons. I had password master protection on store I had read (https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/questions/1175296) it could be a issue about uphold authority who creates these certificates, that i have not certificates for those authorities installed. (your internal signing certificate doesn't chain up to a trusted root, then naturally Firefox gives that UNKNOWN ISSUER error) Setting security.enterprise_roots.enabled is true but i cant change it. dont know why. But, i check and i have installed authority certificates and it wont expired until 2029 So i´m wondering if it would be an issue about master password, needed to obtain certificates and copy it I put master password to navigate so it wont be needed again but maybe firefox need to access certificates in order to copy it again and it is not asking me to provide it. Please, help. Thanks in advance.

title: How do you install Cyrillic fonts in Windows 10?
content:
Here's how to do this:

Select the Start button, and then select Settings > Time & Language > Language. ... Under Preferred languages, select Add a language. Under Choose a language to install, select or type the name of the language that you want to download and install, and then select Next. Fonts Monster
